Family history parkinsons is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Alternative names:
* Family Park.
* Parkinsons family
* Family history parkinsons
* FamilyHistoryParkinson

#### Uses

Family history parkinsons is used by the model in the following places

* [Parkinsons](/model/Parkinsons)

#### Guidance

The user input is chosen from a list and should answer the question

> Does any person in your genetic family have or have had Parkinsons?

The user has the following answer options

* Yes
* No


### Optimizability

[Optimizability](/model/optimizabilities) is a subjective measure used to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Family history parkinsons is 1. This means that it can be interpreted as

> *It is impossible to change and it has never been in your control*
